attributes.action: Families of Servicemen and women who commit suicide should also be allowed to have their loved ones names added to war memorials
attributes.additional_details: Serving or Retired Servicemen and women who suffer from PTSD, whether recognised by the MoD / NHS or not, who commit suicide should have their service to our country recognised. Those loved ones who are left behind should have the right to be allowed to have those lost added to UK war memorials. This is THE very least the Government can do in recognition of the sacrifices these lost souls have made for us.
